EmailTemplate.name: MPWExtraDiesByBudgetOwnerApproval
EmailTemplate.subject: Your {!MPW_Change_Request__c.Request_Type__c} change request for {!MPW_Change_Request__c.MPW_Prime_Die_Name__c} is accepted by Budget Owner.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Your {!MPW_Change_Request__c.Request_Type__c} request for extra dies {!MPW_Change_Request__c.MPW_Prime_Die_Name__c} (Form# {!MPW_Change_Request__c.MPW_Form_Name__c}, {!MPW_Change_Request__c.MPW_Train_Name__c}) is accepted by Budget Owner.
Please review: {!MPW_Change_Request__c.Link}
